textBox.richText: Zarra Studios has released seSales 1.4.2. This is a maintenance release that corrects the following issues: • File Creation Issue Fixed issue with new data files causing an application error. • Activity Reports Updated Activity Reports to include shipping costs. • Activity Reports Corrected an issue in the Activity reports that occurred when an item’s price was changed after being sold. • Drawer Summary Report Corrected an issue where certain types of refunds were not being included in the Drawer report. • Employee Management Improved the performance of the Employee Management window. • Drawer Summary Added drawer detail to the Drawer Summary window. • Rental Rates Rental Rate editing of the currency is now localized. This update is free for all registered users of seSales. MSZ
